title: This is the house that Jack built
creator_credit: Ron Tunis and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: An animated social satire which rewrites the cumulative nursery rhyme ‘The House that Jack built’ and the fairy tale ‘Jack and the Beanstalk’ to produce a portrait of modern conforming man.
